location: North Raleigh, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
Up for sale, is an early Nazi / Polish slotted Radom, 97%...This pistol was manufactured soon after the Nazi's took over the Polish Radom factory in 1941.  The German's reusmed production of the Radom, at the Polish Goverment Arsenal at Radom, Poland for exclusive use by their armed forces.

This is a B block pistol, as these early Nazi radoms were made with a very high polish, and one of the most  well made respected pistols during the WWII, Axis era.  All stamps / e77 / waffenampts, are intact and beautiful.

This is a C&R (curios relics) eligiable firearm.  I am willing to meet  face to face in the Raleigh area, or ship to ffl.

title: For Sale:  DP-12 Double Barrel Pump Action 12 Gauge Shotgun 16 Rounds
postcontent: The DP-12 is a pump-action bullpup style shotgun that has a pair of side-by-side barrels and two seven-round magazine tubes which allow the gun to hold a total of 16 shells when fully loaded. It has a single trigger that fires the barrels one at a time, first the right and then the left. Cycling the slide clears and reloads both chambers. Spent shells eject downwards.Standard Manufacturing Company has raised the bar with this amazing DP-12 Double Barrel Pump Action 12 Gauge shotgun! Merging the best attributes of both a pump and double barrel shotgun, the innovative new DP-12 challenges the conventional action of both pumps and doubles. One slide of the action allows for two trigger pulls, unlike its competition, the UTS-15 and KSG, which require a slide of the action after each trigger pull. Standard Manufacturing has put in extreme care and detail from conception through production of these double barrel repeater shotguns. This double barreled pump 12 gauge shotgun rapidly fires 16 rounds and is the first of its kind! The DP-12 12 Gauge Shotgun fires 2 3/4" or 3" shells and features two (2) 18 7/8" barrels with an overall length of 29.5". Standard Manufacturing designed this shotgun for the most discerning shooters who demand extreme firepower and require consistent reliability. This DP-12 shotgun features spreader choke tubes that are designed to shoot a devastating pattern at 25 yards. The choke tubes have Tru-Choke thread patterns. The DP-12 also provides accessory rails and slots that allow shooters to customize it with their own accessories. The stock has a QR code that shooters can scan with their smartphone or tablet to access the DP-12 Manual and Frequently Asked Questions. Purchase this DP-12 Double Barrel Pump Action 12 Gauge Shotgun from Target Sports USA and receive free shipping!

title: For Sale:   COLT 1911 1918 NICKEL/CHROME FINISH
postcontent: The good part about this pistol is that going through the Harrison book check off list for this 1918 Colt, sans the stocks, and the mag, all of the parts are original and proper. It's hard for me to understand why someone would nickel [chrome-I don't know the diff] finish this 1918 Colt 1911, because the script is uniform and crisp indicating that there was not a lot of grinding to hide a rusty condition. The plating did cover the "JMG" inspection initials. The stocks are pewter made by J. Adams of Vermont in 1989. The mag is a 1911A1 Risdon. Everything, and the list is long on the Harrison list, is correct and proper for this vintage Colt. The barrel is even original with strong lands marked H and P on top, D on the side and 5 on the bottom. If interested, I can show additional photos. This is a C&R firearm. PAYMENT OPTIONS- For immediate shipment I only accept USPS money orders. Payment must be received by me no later than 10 days after the acceptance of offer. If you fail to close the deal I will hold funds until the firearm is sold. If the firearm is sold for less, the difference will be deducted from the deposit plus 10% for my time, storage and taking the firearm off the market for your lay-a-way period. All handguns are shipped to an FFL. SAFETY NOTICE- Buyer is solely responsible for determining that the firearm purchased is safe to shoot. By bidding, the buyer agrees to hold seller harmless against damages, injury, or death caused by buyer's failure to have the firearm properly inspected for safety. RETURN POLICY- All firearms come with a 3-day return policy conditioned upon the firearm being returned in exactly the condition mailed- not being fired , messed with in any way. In the case of a return, buyer pays all shipping charges. FIREARM MUST REMAIN WITH THE FFL DURING THE INSPECTION PERIOD. IF FIRED, SALE IS FINAL. title: For Sale:  Custom M91/30 Mosin Nagant
postcontent:
Custom M91/30 Mosin Nagant built part by part to be a target platform. Rifle has the following features:

- Tula 1929 Hex Receiver
- 22" Barrel (good bore)
- 11 degree Muzzle Crown
- Turned down Bolt (bent bolt handle made by Rock Solid Industries)
- Picatinny rail Scope Mount (Scope Mount made by Rock Solid Industries)  
- Timney Trigger set to 3.5 LBS pull
- Extra power Firing Spring (Wolff Springs)
- Bolt, Receiver and Barrel professionally coated with Teflon (Black Ice Coatings)
- Bedded and custom painted Promag Archangel Stock (also filled in some areas with a slurry of birdshot and epoxy for additional weight and stiffness)

Comes with everything listed above and five magazines (5 round capacity). Scope and Bipod NOT included.

This project did not start with a complete rifle. I purchased a mint condition barreled receiver and built from there so nothing historical was ruined. No corrosive/surplus ammo has been used since I have had the barreled receiver - no guarantees on the previous user(s). I have tried several commercial ammo and this rifle will shoot 1.5 MOA on a good day but I average 2 to 2.5 MOA with Tulammo. It may perform even better in more experienced hands.

title: For Sale:  NWTF TriStar 12 Gauge Auto Banquet Gun NIB
postcontent:
NIB. I removed the contents to clean the packing oil and assemble it for the pictures. Barrel had not been touched before. Box says "RAPTOR HP NWTF".

I couldn't find any of these on the net for sale, not even with this walnut stock, so I called TriStar. These are not catalog guns as they are "exclusives" to NWFT. I was told that it was part of a special order of 200 and the gun was made in 2014. The only thing they could tell me was that they do not have MSRP's on exclusives and that the options on the gun are not like Raptors that can be bought from tristar. The stocks have a cut checkering and design that are only found on these and some special order Ducks Unlimited. They are shiny gloss finished.

The other elements of the shotgun are: 3" gas operated system with removable choke system that uses Beretta Mobile threads. Three chokes are included (IC, M, F) with a tool in a container. Has a maunal EZ load magazine cutoff, vent rib w/matted sight plain, fiber optic sight, 5 round magazine (plug included if needed).

The barrel has a 3" chrome lined chamber and the barrel is also chrome lined. The gun weighs just under 7 pounds unloaded.

Here is how the manual explains the action: Gas operated semi-automatic. Bolt remains open after last round is fired. If magazine and chamber are both loaded, opening action will result in ejecting shell from chamber and cycling new shell from magazine in to the chamber. If operator desires to unload the chamber only, slightly push lifter (little switch on side of trigger) up and open action. This cuts the magazine off from cycling a new shell while unloading the chamber. Chamber will remain closed.

Safety: primary safety on backside of trigger guard. When engaged, blocks trigger, hammer lever and hammer.

Magazine: Tubular, bottom loading, plug is included and installs and uninstalls by unscrewing mag cap and removing or inserting plug.

This is a beautiful gun and is just as light and mobile as a Browning Light 20. I have tons of pics of unboxing it and putting it together and will either put it back in the box or whatever. Breaks down in a few seconds. Internals are very solid and either SS or alunminum. Can email more pics.

I'm not a shotgun guy and am open to trades for handguns, rifles, AR's, AK's.....$550 or best offer or trade. Thanks.

Texts are fine 515 664 5nine78.

title: For Sale:  Colt LE901-16S 901 .308 Carbine w/ Conversion Kit
postcontent:
This Colt LE901 with the Adapter Block Conversion Kit is the older version. The newer versions are being sold by Colt WITHOUT the LE901 Adapter Block Conversion Kit and they are making the kit available for purchase separately.
Be it prairie dog hunting in Texas, whitetail hunting in Maine or elk hunting in Colorado, the Colt LE901-16Sâ¢ is the rifle for the hunt. At first glance you would think that the Colt 901 is just a .308 Win./7.62 NATO version of a standard AR-15, much like any other .308 AR out there, but it is a lot more than that. The Colt LE901-16S is a âModular Carbine,â which means it can be adapted to any AR-15 platform upper. This isnât a new concept, because there are of course a whole bunch of different caliber uppers for ARs. The difference is in all the other ones, they have adapted a standard size AR magazine to boutique calibers and cartridge designs. The Colt 901 is different. It can be adapted from .308/7.62, using standard P-Mags, to .223/5.56, using standard AR mags, and back again, in literally seconds. The design uses one proprietary part, and you have to swap out the recoil system. It is that simple, and it works fantastic.
